title: Tomorrow is maybe
creator_credit: Michael Halvajian and KRMA-TV (Television station : Denver, Colo.)
brief_description: Examines man’s dilemma of how to behave toward his environment. Is modern urban life, with its artificiality and ugly trappings of pollution and untrammelled usage of nature’s commodities, an instinctive protection against the alien silence and solitude of the wilderness? Narrated by Ben Aviary.
